name: The Lost Heirloom
objective: Retrieve a stolen family ring from bandits
notes: Bandits hideout 2 miles south; 5 bandits led by Scarface Jack

name: Dragon's Demand
objective: Negotiate or defeat the red dragon threatening the city
notes: Dragon is ancient and intelligent; may be reasoned with

name: The Cursed Village
objective: Lift the curse afflicting the village
notes: Curse traced to nearby ruins; undead rising at night

name: Mystery of the Fey
objective: Discover why fey creatures are raiding travelers
